Metadata.desc: Enhance your Sigmally experience with SigModz. Download the latest SigMod and SigFixes mods to unlock advanced features, performance upgrades, macros, themes, and more. Simple setup, powerful tools, regular updates.

hero.title: Sigmally Modz
hero.sub: Boost your Sigmally sessions with smoother performance, smarter tools and a setup that feels like yours.

what.title: What is Sigmally?
what.desc: Sigmally is a quick browser-based agar.io-style game that runs on private servers for steadier performance. You jump in, pick up pellets, dodge players and build up your cell with clean physics and sharp controls. Play alone, team up with friends, climb the leaderboard and join community events whenever you want.

why.title: Why
why.desc: SigModz gives you the tools to shape the game the way you like it. Set up macros for splits and feeds, tweak UI themes and layouts and let small tasks like grabbing daily coins run on their own. With performance boosts, multibox options and simple in-game controls youâ€™ll play cleaner and faster whether youâ€™re casual or competitive.

sigmod.title: SigMod
sigmod.desc: SigMod puts a full mod menu right into your game. Build custom macros, switch up themes and layouts and automate things like daily-coin collection. Adjust your HUD, keybinds and chat settings so everything feels natural while you play.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: SigFixes improves performance for steadier frame rates and minimal lag. Load in faster, get tighter input response and control multiple accounts with built-in multibox tools. Tune draw delay, opacity, zoom and name scaling to keep everything running smooth.

questions.question: Are these scripts safe?
questions.answer: Yes. Everythingâ€™s open-source and Tampermonkey is widely trusted. No hidden tricks.

questions.question: Do I need both mods?
questions.answer: Not really. Using SigMod and SigFixes together gives you the best mix of control and speed.

questions.question: Are they allowed in Sigmally?
questions.answer: Yes. Both mods are well known and accepted by the community and the owner.

questions.question: Can I remove them anytime?
questions.answer: Sure. Just turn them off or uninstall them in your userscript manager.

questions.question: Will SigMod turn me into a pro gamer overnight?
questions.answer: If only. SigMod makes things smoother and easier to handle but skill comes from you: timing, reads and practice.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Join our Discord for support, bug reports and late-night help from other players.

Hero.title: SigMod Client
Hero.sub: Elevate your Sigmally gameplay with custom macros, team tags, UI tweaks and full in-game personalization.

macros.title: Macros & Automation
macros.desc: Play smarter with custom shortcuts, click-sequence macros, instant respawns and auto-coin claims.

party.title: Party & Tag System
party.desc: Make a 3-character tag for teammates, track them on the minimap, chat privately and send precise pings.

customization.title: Full Personalization
customization.desc: Change UI themes, pick fonts, rearrange layouts and remap keys from one menu.

WhySigMod.title: Why choose SigMod?
WhySigMod.desc1: SigMod adds automation, personalization and full UI control to Sigmally. Set up macros, move panels, remap keys and tweak visuals from a clean in-game dashboard. Change themes, bookmark names and snap screenshots in one click.
WhySigMod.desc2: Work with your squad using dynamic tags: private chat, tactical pings and live minimap markers. Check match stats, manage friends and tweak chat fonts and keybinds on the fly.
WhySigMod.performance: Want peak performance? Pair SigMod with

list.title: Macros & Automation
list.summary: Automate moves: keybinds, tricksplits and mouse macros
list.details: Bind keys for advanced actions like rapid feed, double/triple/quad splits and tricksplits. Create mouse macros for left and right click. Set precise delays and feed speeds. Toggle names, skins or respawn with a key. Everything is customizable.

list.title: Party & Tag System
list.summary: 3-character tags, minimap tracking, pings and private chat
list.details: Pick a 3-character tag to form a team. See members on the minimap, view their names and scores in a party panel and send exact pings. Party chat stays private so your calls stay with the team.

list.title: Menu Customization
list.summary: Themes, fonts, layouts, tabs and input styling
list.details: Personalize your UI with themes, rounded corners, background images and custom input borders. Hide elements you don't want. Rearrange tabs, adjust spacing and switch layouts for a setup that fits you.

list.title: Visual Game Settings
list.summary: Tweak map colors, opacity, cell styling and fonts
list.details: Change color and transparency for the map, border, food and cells. Replace in-game images like viruses or backgrounds. Pick fonts, show or hide names and skins, add text outlines and toggle overlays like grid and border.

list.title: Gallery & Screenshots
list.summary: Capture moments and manage your gallery
list.details: Assign a key to take screenshots in-game. Browse images in the Gallery tab with timestamps and easy delete or download options. Clean up or export your shots in one place.

list.title: Name Tools & Color Effects
list.summary: Save names, use generators, gradients and symbols
list.details: Use nickname generators, save favorites for quick copy and create names with special characters. Design vibrant name colors with gradients and two-tone effects. Delete or reuse names fast.

list.title: Friends & Mod Profile
list.summary: Add users, chat privately and shape your mod profile
list.details: Log in to create a mod profile and add friends by username or Discord. See online status, tag and server info. Use search and filters, customize your avatar and bio, and control who can find you.

list.title: Stats & Quick Access Panel
list.summary: Track play and toggle key settings fast
list.details: Home shows stats like time played, top mass and deaths. The quick access panel toggles Mass, Grid, Border, Jelly Physics, Auto-Respawn, Coin Claim and more without digging through menus.

list.title: Chat System Overhaul
list.summary: Custom chat with tabs, keybinds and full control
list.details: Switch between Party and Main chat with tabs. Messages update live. Use keybinds to share location, toggle blur or add time tags. Customize text, background and theme transparency.

list.question: What are the core features of SigMod?
list.answer: A customizable mod menu, powerful macros, a party and tag system, live stats and a modern chat, name and friend system to improve your Sigmally play.

list.question: What customization options does SigMod offer?
list.answer: Change themes, fonts, layout spacing, border radius, name colors including gradients, UI opacity and many visual settings. It also supports deathscreen tweaks, skin overrides and background presets.

list.question: What is the tag system?
list.answer: Assign a 3-character tag to form a party. Track teammates on the minimap, chat privately, send pings and view scores in a shared panel.

list.question: How does the friend system work?
list.answer: Create a mod profile, add friends, view profiles and chat directly. See online status, server info and manage requests and visibility.

list.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
list.answer: Press V or click the gear icon in the top-right corner. The menu has tabs for Macros, Themes, Gallery, Friends and more.

list.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
list.answer: Yes. SigMod has advanced keybinding for feeding, splitting and tricksplits. You can assign mouse macros, set split sequences and bind UI toggles.

list.question: Does SigMod affect game performance?
list.answer: SigMod is optimized to stay lightweight. For better framerate or less lag, install SigFixes which targets performance bottlenecks.

list.question: Can I take and manage screenshots?
list.answer: Yes. Use a keybind to capture screenshots, view them by date in the Gallery and download or delete with one click.

Community.title: Join the Community
Community.text: Need help, found a bug or want to share macros? Join the Discord and connect with other SigMod users.

Hero.title: SigFixes
Hero.sub: Enhance Sigmally's core with ultra smooth performance, precise input and advanced multibox control.

performance.title: Boosted Performance
performance.desc: Replaces the rendering engine for faster visuals, fewer spikes and better overall stability.

multiboxing.title: Flawless Multiboxing
multiboxing.desc: One-tab control, outline tweaks, merge aids and smart respawn tools optimized for multibox setups.

input.title: Precision Input
input.desc: Cuts input delay and improves control accuracy, which helps a lot when using macros or split plays.

WhySigFixes.title: Why choose SigFixes?
WhySigFixes.desc1: SigFixes overhauls Sigmally's rendering for smoother frames and sharper input. It removes common stutters, lowers delay and keeps gameplay steady under pressure.
WhySigFixes.desc2: Built for serious players, it shines when multiboxing. Faster inputs, synced camera behavior and visual tweaks help you track and merge with full control.
WhySigFixes.combo: Pair both for the ultimate experience.

list.title: Performance
list.summary: Replaces the canvas with high-speed WebGL rendering
list.details: SigFixes cuts lag spikes by swapping the game's canvas for an optimized WebGL renderer. Expect smoother gameplay, better framerates and steady performance across devices, even while multiboxing or recording.

list.title: Accurate Input
list.summary: Less delay between your input and movement
list.details: Feel real-time response when moving, feeding and splitting. SigFixes reduces latency and tightens control for mouse and keyboard actions. Moves feel sharper and more precise in fast fights.

list.title: Advanced Multiboxing
list.summary: One-tab control, vision merging and respawn handling
list.details: Manage multiple instances from a single tab. Pick your vision merge method, customize outlines and colors, and set respawn rules. Enable smooth merging, block cluster respawns and tune setups for 2+ tabs.

list.title: Draw Settings
list.summary: Tweak draw delay, cell outlines, camera and zoom
list.details: Set draw delay to balance visuals and performance. Toggle cell outlines, set a skin URL, choose camera behavior like Natural or Instant, and tweak zoom speed and auto-zoom for a responsive feel.

list.title: Visual Tools
list.summary: Opacity, glow, skins, jelly physics and grid lines
list.details: Adjust visibility and behavior for cells, skins and pellets. Turn jelly physics and overlays on or off, highlight unsplittable cells with custom colors and fine-tune glow and opacity.

list.title: Theme Customization
list.summary: Pick a theme color and control UI visuals
list.details: Choose a theme color and apply it across the mod. Match the UI to your style with color accents, map backgrounds and effects like rainbow borders.

list.title: Game Behavior Tweaks
list.summary: Pushsplit delay, XP score split and aftersplit movement
list.details: Control post-split behavior, including movement timing, pushsplit handling and how XP and score display. These options make competitive movement easier to master.

list.title: Camera Control
list.summary: Smoothness, speed and spawn camera logic
list.details: Adjust camera motion: Instant, Natural or Smooth. Control spawn camera behavior, zoom interpolation and speed to fit your setup.

list.title: Text Rendering
list.summary: Font size, weight, outline and clan display
list.details: Change name and mass scale, toggle bold text, apply outlines and show or hide clans. Great for minimal setups or for staying readable in chaotic matches.

list.question: What is SigFixes?
list.answer: SigFixes is a performance patch for the Sigmally client. It swaps the rendering engine for a WebGL canvas to make gameplay smoother, faster and more responsive, which is great for multiboxing and competitive play.

list.question: Does SigFixes change how the game looks?
list.answer: By default it looks the same as the original client. For advanced users it adds options like skin overrides, cell opacity, text scaling, glow and outlines for unsplittable cells.

list.question: Can I use SigFixes with SigMod?
list.answer: Yes. SigFixes works alongside SigMod to combine advanced features with improved performance and less lag.

list.question: Will SigFixes help with multiboxing?
list.answer: Yes. It offers one-tab control, vision merge options, spawn blocking and tab outlines to reduce input delay and improve sync between tabs.

list.question: How do I install SigFixes?
list.answer: Install Tampermonkey or Violentmonkey, enable Developer Mode in your extensions page, then install the SigFixes userscript from the official source and restart your browser.

list.question: What camera settings can I adjust?
list.answer: Switch between Default and Natural camera styles, set movement to Instant or Smooth, control zoom speed and enable Auto-zoom and spawn camera tracking.

list.question: What is the 'draw delay' setting?
list.answer: Draw delay controls how often the canvas refreshes. Higher values smooth animations but may lower performance; lower values boost performance but can make visuals less fluid. Tune it to your taste.

list.question: Can I customize text and name display?
list.answer: Yes. Adjust name and mass scaling, toggle bold fonts, set opacity, show or hide clan tags and tweak outline thickness for clarity or a cleaner UI.

Community.title: Join the Community
Community.text: Need help, found a bug or want to share macros? Join the Discord and connect with other SigFix users.

QuickGuide.title: Quick Guide
QuickGuide.note: This page is a short summary, not the full guide.

tampermonkey.title: Install Tampermonkey
tampermonkey.desc: Install the userscript manager required to run SigMod and SigFixes.

developermode.title: Enable Developer Mode
developermode.desc: Follow the pictures below and restart your browser after enabling developer mode.

sigmod.title: Install SigMod
sigmod.desc: Adds macros, customization, party tags and more.

sigfixes.title: Install SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: Boost FPS, reduce lag and enable multiboxing.

Overview.title: Getting Started
Overview.desc: Welcome to SigModz. This guide shows how to install SigMod and SigFixes, the two core mods that boost Sigmally with smoother performance, total control and useful tools.
Overview.access: In a few simple steps you'll unlock smart macros, FPS boosts, UI tweaks and advanced settings.

video.title: Video tutorial
video.desc: Watch this if you prefer visual instructions.

UserscriptManager.title: Install a Userscript Manager
UserscriptManager.desc: You need a userscript manager extension to run these mods.
UserscriptManager.instruction: This guide uses Tampermonkey. Click below to install it for your browser.
UserscriptManager.installed: Once installed you'll be ready to add userscripts like <SigMod>SigMod</SigMod> and <SigFixes>SigFixes</SigFixes> in the next step.

DevMode.title: Enable Developer Mode
DevMode.desc: Tampermonkey needs Developer Mode enabled to install and run SigMod and SigFixes properly.

chrome.title: How to Enable
chrome.desc: For Chrome, enable Allow User Scripts in the Tampermonkey extension settings.
steps: Click the puzzle icon in your browser's toolbar
Click the three dots next to Tampermonkey

opera.title: For Opera
steps: Click the cube icon (Extensions) in your toolbar
Toggle Developer Mode on at the top right

edge.title: For Edge
steps: Click the puzzle icon (Extensions) in your toolbar
Enable Developer Mode in the sidebar

firefox.title: For Firefox
steps: Firefox doesn't require Developer Mode. You can skip this step.

default.title: Browser Instructions
steps: Check your browser docs for enabling Developer Mode
If using a Chromium browser, follow the steps above

note.label: Note:
note.text: Restart your browser after enabling Developer Mode to ensure Tampermonkey works.

SigMod.title: Install SigMod
SigMod.desc: With your userscript manager ready, install SigMod to add macros, themes and advanced settings to the game.
SigMod.popup: Click below to install SigMod. In the popup hit Install.
SigMod.after: Once installed SigMod runs automatically on Sigmally. Customize it in the in-game settings. Learn more about SigMod <link>here</link>.

SigFixes.title: Install SigFixes
SigFixes.desc: SigFixes rewrites parts of Sigmally's client to boost speed and smoothness. Made by yx.
SigFixes.features: Includes options like one-tab multiboxing, unsplittable cell outlines, draw delay, text size, skins and opacity.

End.title: You're All Set ðŸŽ‰
End.desc: SigMod and SigFixes are installed. Enjoy a smoother, more customizable Sigmally experience. Dive in, tweak your setup and play your best.
End.notice: Restart your browser before joining the game

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions

installMods.question: How do I install the mods?
installMods.answer: Follow the detailed or quick <link>installation guide</link>. You'll be set up fast.

modsNotWorking.question: I installed the mods but they arenâ€™t working. What now?
modsNotWorking.answer: Most issues come from Allow User Scripts not being enabled in Tampermonkey on Chrome or Brave or Developer Mode not being on in Edge or Opera. Check the <link>installation guide</link> for exact steps. If it still doesnâ€™t work join the Discord and open a ticket.

safe.question: Are Tampermonkey and these userscripts safe?
safe.answer: Yes. Tampermonkey is a trusted extension used by many people and our scripts only improve the game. There are no hidden actions and you can read reviews on the script pages.

sigmodAndSigfixes.question: Do I need both SigMod and SigFixes?
sigmodAndSigfixes.answer: No. Using both together gives the best performance and customization.

multibox.question: How do I multibox?
multibox.answer: Install SigFixes to run multiple game instances in one tab and control them together. For a full setup follow the guide <link>here</link>.

uninstallMods.question: Can I uninstall the mods anytime?
uninstallMods.answer: Yes. Disable or remove them in your userscript manager whenever you want.

coreFeatures.question: What are SigModâ€™s core features?
coreFeatures.answer: SigMod adds customization, macros, automation and an advanced tag system.

customization.question: What customization options does SigMod provide?
customization.answer: You can change hotkeys, themes, colors, timers, fonts and name settings.

tagSystem.question: What is the tag system?
tagSystem.answer: It helps you manage party tags and track teammates. It links with the minimap and chat and shows team info for better coordination.

friendSystem.question: How does the friend system work?
friendSystem.answer: Add and manage friends to stay connected and coordinate play.

openMenu.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
openMenu.answer: Click the gear icon in the game UI or press V on your keyboard.

customHotkeys.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
customHotkeys.answer: Yes. SigMod lets you adjust all hotkeys and mouse macros to fit your playstyle.

performance.question: Does SigMod impact game performance?
performance.answer: SigMod is light and focuses on customization. For FPS boosts use SigFixes.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes Specific
sigfixes.note: Each setting has a ? icon with a detailed explanation.

improvements.question: What does SigFixes improve?
improvements.answer: SigFixes increases frame rates, cuts lag spikes, allows smooth multiboxing and adds options like draw delay, opacity and name scaling.

multibox.question: How does SigFixes help with multiboxing?
multibox.answer: It lets you run several game instances in one tab with smooth control.

fps.question: Will SigFixes improve my FPS?
fps.answer: Yes. It boosts FPS by optimizing rendering and reducing lag.

compatibility.question: Is SigFixes compatible with SigMod?
compatibility.answer: Yes. They work together without issues.

config.question: How do I configure draw delay and other settings?
config.answer: Open the SigFixes menu and adjust them. Check the ? icons for details.

FAQPage.needHelp: Still have questions? Join our Discord and open a ticket.

tldr.title: What is SigModz?
tldr.text: SigModz is a community project that improves the Sigmally experience with powerful mods like SigMod and SigFixes.

story.title: Background
story.intro: SigModz brings together players and developers who want to make Sigmally better with new features and solid tools.
story.sigmodStart: It started with SigMod, a userscript based on RingZer0's open-source version. His work became the base for modern Sigmally modding.
story.sigmod: SigMod added more customization, UI improvements, macros and community features which made it one of the most used mods in Sigmally.
story.sigfixes: Later SigFixes by yx pushed things further with a full WebGL renderer, multiboxing support, better input handling and performance upgrades for serious play.
story.community: Both mods are accepted by the Sigmally community and supported by the game's owner. SigModz keeps growing with help from players and developers.
story.thanks: Thanks to RingZer0 for the original base and to yx for pushing technical progress. The community support keeps SigModz moving forward.

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: SigMod is a modification for {sigmallyLink}. By using it you agree to these terms. If you donâ€™t agree you shouldnâ€™t use SigMod.

fairUse.heading: 2. Fair Use
fairUse.text: SigMod is made to improve the game, not to break it. Donâ€™t change it to gain unfair advantages or use automation that harms the experience for others.

noGuarantees.heading: 3. No Guarantees
noGuarantees.text: SigMod is provided as is. If something goes wrong like a ban, data loss, or anything else, we are not responsible.

dataCollection.heading: 4. Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: SigMod collects some data so it can work correctly:
items: Google account data if you use it to sign in
Player stats like Gold and Level but nothing personal
dataCollection.accountText: If you use the Friends feature you need an account with a username and password. Passwords are hashed and stored securely. You can check the backend code, including how passwords are handled, on {githubLink}.

changes.heading: 5. Changes to These Terms
changes.text: These terms may change. If you keep using SigMod after updates you accept the new terms.

enforcement.heading: 6. Enforcement
enforcement.text: If you break the rules we may take action including IP bans. If serious financial harm is caused, legal action may be considered.

contact.heading: 7. Contact
contact.intro: If you have questions reach out:

items.question: I bought coins or a subscription and they do not appear on my account. What should I do?
items.answer: Refresh the page. If the balance still doesn't update please contact support.

items.question: What happens after I complete my PayPal payment?
items.answer: You'll be redirected back to the site where your order is confirmed and items are added to your account.

items.question: What if I close the PayPal tab before it redirects back?
items.answer: No problem. Reopen the site and check your order status. If the payment went through delivery will still be processed.

items.question: Can I use my purchase on multiple accounts?
items.answer: No. Purchases are tied to the account used at checkout to keep things secure and fair.

items.question: What if I accidentally bought the wrong package?
items.answer: Contact support right away. If the order is not confirmed we can adjust or refund it.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At SigModz we respect your privacy and aim to protect your personal information. This policy explains what we collect and how we use it.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.content: We may collect personal information such as your email address, account info, payment details and any other information you voluntarily provide.

2.title: 2. Use of Information
2.content: We use your information to deliver and improve our services, process payments, communicate with you and meet legal obligations.

3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
3.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted service providers, payment processors or legal authorities when required by law.

4.title: 4. Data Security
4.content: We use reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure or destruction. No method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

5.title: 5. Your Rights
5.content: You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights contact us at sigmallymod@proton.me.

6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
6.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Continued use of SigModz means you accept the updated policy.

7.title: 7. Contact
7.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy contact us at sigmallymod@proton.me.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: We want you to be happy with your purchase. If you're not satisfied you may request a refund under the conditions below.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: Refunds are available for digital goods within 14 days of purchase, provided the content has not been used. All requests are subject to verification.

process.title: Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund contact support via email or Discord. Once approved refunds are processed within 3â€“5 business days.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For refund questions reach out to sigmallymod@proton.me or create a ticket on our Discord server.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service

1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
1.content: By using SigModz you confirm that you have read and accept these terms.

2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
2.content: Do not misuse our services, upload illegal content or interfere with the site. Fraud or abuse may lead to suspension or termination.

3.title: 3. Digital Goods & Payments
3.content: We sell digital goods. All purchases follow our Refund Policy. We are not responsible for loss or damage from using digital goods.

4.title: 4. Disclaimer & Limitation of Liability
4.content: Services are provided as is. SigModz is not liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from use of our site or services.

5.title: 5. Changes to Terms
5.content: We may update these terms. Continued use of SigModz means you accept the changes.

6.title: 6. Account Termination
6.content: We may suspend or terminate accounts for violations, fraud or other misuse.

7.title: 7. Governing Law
7.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Germany and disputes will be handled in German courts.

8.title: 8. Contact
8.content: If you have questions about these terms contact us at sigmallymod@proton.me.
